name: gradient graphic t-shirt
description: This graphic t-shirt which is perfect for any occasion. Crafted from a soft and breathable fabric, it offers superior comfort and style.

name: polo with tipping details
description: A classic polo designed with subtle tipping details for a modern touch. Soft, breathable fabric ensures all-day comfort and versatility.

name: black striped t-shirt
description: A stylish striped t-shirt that blends casual and modern appeal. Made with lightweight fabric, it keeps you cool and comfortable anywhere.

name: skinny fit jeans
description: These skinny fit jeans provide a sleek and modern silhouette. Crafted with stretchable fabric, they ensure comfort and flexibility all day.

name: checkered shirt
description: A timeless checkered shirt perfect for smart-casual looks. Its soft cotton fabric provides breathable comfort and effortless everyday style.

name: sleeve striped t-shirt
description: This striped sleeve t-shirt adds a sporty and casual vibe. Lightweight and breathable, it is perfect for everyday wear and easy styling.
